Name: 1st District
Description: The central district of Petroupoli, featuring main commercial streets and public services.

Name: 2nd District
Description: A mainly residential area with schools, parks, and local businesses.

Name: 3rd District
Description: Known for its proximity to Mount Parnitha, offering hiking trails and green spaces.

Name: 4th District
Description: A quieter district with suburban-style housing and a strong community feel.

Name: 5th District
Description: An emerging area with new developments, modern housing, and expanding infrastructure.
